original_text: And as they heard these things, he added and spake a parable, because he was nigh to Jerusalem, and because they thought that the kingdom of God should immediately appear.
korean_text: 그들이 이 말씀을 듣고 있을 때에 비유를 더하여 말씀하시니 이는 자기가 예루살렘에 가까이 오셨고 그들은 하나님의 나라가 당장에 나타날 줄로 생각함이더라

sentences.original_text: And as they heard these things
he added and spake a parable
because he was nigh to Jerusalem
that the kingdom of God should immediately appear
